title: The Brethren: Inside the Supreme Court
description: The Brethren is the first detailed behind-the-scenes account of the Supreme Court in action.Bob Woodward and Scott Armstrong have pierced its secrecy to give us an unprecedented view of the Chief and Associate Justicesâ€”maneuvering, arguing, politicking, compromising, and making decisions that affect every major area of American life.
author: Bob Woodward
